description:
Kaley Cuoco is in a rush to get to that altar.Kaley Cuoco急着要结婚了。

A new report in Us Weekly claims that the "Big Bang Theory" star is planning to kick off 2014 as a married woman by trying the knot with fiance Ryan Sweeting on New Year's Eve.《Us Weekly》报道，《生活大爆炸》女星Kaley Cuoco打算在2014年新年和未婚夫Ryan Sweeting结婚。

Sources tell the magazine that Cuoco and her tennis player hunk have chosen to make it official on Dec. 31 in Southern California. Apparently, the evening will double as a fire-and-ice-themed holiday party, with drinks, dancing and several reasons for celebration.知情人士透露，Cuoco和网球选手未婚夫已经把日子选在了2013年12月31日，地点在加利福尼亚南部。这个日子和地点的选择，说明了这个婚礼明显会是冰与火主题、充满了美酒与欢舞的盛大派对。

Cuoco and Sweeting confirmed their engagement in late September, after just three months of dating. In the face of rumors spurred by how fast the relationship has progressed, the sitcom star has vocally disputed the possibility that's she may be pregnant.Cuoco和Sweeting在今年9月宣布订婚的消息，当时他们的恋情才开始3个月。在大家都在疑惑为什么这么快就订婚的时候，当事人表示不是因为女方怀孕的原因。

title: 《生活大爆炸》女主潘小花明年结婚
